comments.author: Steve
comments.body:
![](http://www.flagstafffrenzy.org/wp-content/uploads/2009/07/coup.jpg)  FOOTAGBALDDEEDEECoup d'Etat: Steve steps away; Frenzy experiences a quantum leap in quality

I don't know about you, but I've actually been enjoying Frenzy posts for the past month. This has to be one of the first peaceful coups here at HQ in a long whileâ€”when Burton arrived, it was a weekly occurrence.

Anyhow, let's make Dave and iSean permanent editors! All in favor?

I'm going to see how badly living at sea-level has affected me. Flagstaff @ 12p, leaving from HUMN.
